Top Loading Catheter Bag

This custom-made luggage bag was designed to take up minimal space and still give you access to all of your long equipment and supplies. Its golf-bag-style opening makes accessing your catheters, long boxes, or heart failure supplies very easy. Â The large front pockets allow you to carry other smaller supplies or devices. The side flat pockets are perfect for literature or other thin items. We can put any logo or embroidery on the bag.

CUSTOM BAG FEATURES:

  • Embroidery options for up to 2 locations of the bag
  • Foam padding throughout the inside and hard plastic on the outside to protect your equipment
  • Interior foam padding and exterior hard plastic to protect your equipment
  • Commercial grade materials
  • Multiple color options available
  • 4 zipper pockets for literature and other thinner items
  • 2 large pouch zippered pockets to hold and organize large materials and boxes
  • Our Watts Bags exclusive wheel system
  • Contoured Grab Handles on each end to make lifting the bag into your vehicle a snap
  • Lid buckle allows you to clip into telescoping handle so the lid stay open for easy access

  • Learn more about bag features

Top Loading Catheter Bag

  • How to Size your Bag Bag Features
  • Rigid Weight: 15.4 lbs
  • Lightened Weight: 13.8 lbs
  • Loaded Dimensions: 43.5" Deep x 15" Wide x 18.5" Long
  • Internal Dimensions: 39" Deep x 12.5" Wide x 12.5" Long
  • Minimum Vehicle Space Needed: 43.5" Deep x 15" Wide x 16" Long
